amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Safety Center at the University of Nebraska at Kearney; established.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The Board of Regents of the University of Nebraska may establish the Nebraska Safety Center at the University of Nebraska at Kearney.
(2) It is the intent of the Legislature that existing available land and facilities be utilized in the establishment and administration of the center.
